column1: The Hair of Galadriel was described as golden touched with silver and seemed to shine with the light of the Two Trees of Valinor. Fëanor requested a strand of Galadriels hair three times
column2: but she refused each time. Gimli of the Fellowship of the Ring was asked which Gifts of Galadriel he would like prior to leaving Lothlórien

column1: Galadriels response surprised all of the Elves
column2: she granted Gimlis wish and gave him three golden strands of her hair
column3: which were later set in crystal as a "pledge of good will between the Mountain and the Wood until the end of days."
